name: The Pocket Dimmension
description:
You wake up in a house you dont remember, or so you think. You are being stalked by a black figure that looks like you...but also doesnt.

You need to get out of this place, but in your journey you fall into the hands of the black figure.  And you are transported to its Pocket Dimmension.

The thick liquid that floods the dark room and prevents you from moving normally, so you decide to hop one jump at a time. But you can hear the black figure lurking behind you. The only way you think you can get out is to go inside the bright white door  in the other side of the inky lake. So be fast!

Use space to move foward, and do it fast.

Every jump gives you points, if you hit in of the wreking balls.

This is just a demo that i made for the "Open Jam" game jam, but i will update it constantly.

Also, the awsome ost made by a friend:  Zancantarian.

Please do not press "d" on the main menu...just dont.
